org.apache.archiva.components.graph.api

Interface Graph<V extends Node<V>>

  • Type Parameters:
    V -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectedGraph, SimpleGraph

    public interface Graph<V extends Node<V>>
    A graph is the container for nodes. The nodes are connected by edges. Each node and edge instance is coupled to the graph where it was created.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Edge<V> addEdge(RelationType type, String id, String label, V sourceNode, V destinationNode)
      Creates a new edge instance with the given id or returns the edge instance with the given id and type.
      Edge<V> addEdge(String id, String label, V sourceNode, V destinationNode)
      Creates a new edge instance with the given id or returns the edge instance with the given id.
      V addNode(String id, String label)
      Adds a new node if the id does not exist yet, otherwise returns the node with the given id and the new label set.
      List<V> findNodes(String query)
      Finds nodes using a given query.
      Edge<V> getEdge(String id)
      Returns the edge with the given id.
      V getNode(String id)
      Returns the node with the given id
      Set<V> getNodes()
      Returns all nodes of the graph
      Edge<V> newEdge(RelationType type, String label, V sourceNode, V destinationNode)
      Creates a new edge instance with the given label.
      Edge<V> newEdge(String label, V sourceNode, V destinationNode)
      Creates a new edge instance with the given label.
      V newNode(String label)
      Creates a node with the given label in the graph.
      void removeEdge(Edge<V> edge)
      Removes the edge from the graph and unregisters it from the source and destination
      void removeNode(V node) 

    • Method Detail

      • newNode

        V newNode(String label)
        Creates a node with the given label in the graph. The id of the node is generated by the graph implementation. The method returns always a new node instance, even if a node with the given label exists already.
        Parameters:
        label - the label of the new node
        Returns:
        a new node instance with the given label and a generated id

      • addNode

        V addNode(String id,
          String label)
        Adds a new node if the id does not exist yet, otherwise returns the node with the given id and the new label set.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the node
        label - the label of the node
        Returns:
        a new node instance or the existing node with the given id

      • removeNode

        void removeNode(V node)

      • newEdge

        Edge<V> newEdge(String label,
                V sourceNode,
                V destinationNode)
         throws IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new edge instance with the given label. The method returns always a new edge instance, even if a edge with the given label exists already. The type is set to StandardRelationType.DEFAULT
        Parameters:
        label - the edge label
        sourceNode - the source node
        destinationNode - the destination node
        Returns:
        a new edge instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if source or destination is null

      • newEdge

        Edge<V> newEdge(RelationType type,
                String label,
                V sourceNode,
                V destinationNode)
         throws IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new edge instance with the given label. The method returns always a new edge instance, even if a edge with the given label exists already.
        Parameters:
        type - the edge type
        label - the edge label
        sourceNode - the source node
        destinationNode - the destination node
        Returns:
        a new edge instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the source or destination node is null

      • addEdge

        Edge<V> addEdge(RelationType type,
                String id,
                String label,
                V sourceNode,
                V destinationNode)
         throws IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new edge instance with the given id or returns the edge instance with the given id and type. If a edge with the id exists already but with a different type it will throw a IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the edge
        id - the id
        label - the edge label
        sourceNode - the source node
        destinationNode - the destination node
        Returns:
        the newly created edge instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a edge instance with the given id but a different type exists already. Or if source or destination node is null

      • addEdge

        Edge<V> addEdge(String id,
                String label,
                V sourceNode,
                V destinationNode)
         throws IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new edge instance with the given id or returns the edge instance with the given id. If the edge is newly created it will get the type StandardRelationType.DEFAULT
        Parameters:
        id - the id
        label - the edge label
        sourceNode - the source node
        destinationNode - the destination node
        Returns:
        the newly created edge instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if source or destination is null

      • removeEdge

        void removeEdge(Edge<V> edge)
        Removes the edge from the graph and unregisters it from the source and destination
        Parameters:
        edge - the edge to remove

      • getNode

        V getNode(String id)
        Returns the node with the given id
        Parameters:
        id - the node id
        Returns:
        the found node, or null, if it does not exist

      • findNodes

        List<V> findNodes(String query)
        Finds nodes using a given query. The query syntax depends on the graph implementation.
        Parameters:
        query - the query to find nodes
        Returns:
        the found nodes, or a empty list

      • getEdge

        Edge<V> getEdge(String id)
        Returns the edge with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - the edge id
        Returns:
        the found edge instance, or null, if it does not exist

      • getNodes

        Set<V> getNodes()
        Returns all nodes of the graph
        Returns:
        the set of nodes that build the graph
